segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures everyday life gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult's at the sink, apron on, drying that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on, but she's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing water's creating a sheet down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's widening at her feet; slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids are behind her, up to cookie mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's climbing the stool, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's reaching up, all eager and innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating so sweetly, despite the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets will be soaked; what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside window, the garden's tidy and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight makes it all seem deceptively peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away; too much potential for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
